task.title: How can I control how others see me in their contact list and who can contact me?
task.shortdesc: You can create privacy lists to control who sees your status on their contact list when you are online or when your status is "Do Not Disturb." These lists apply to all your server communities. If you have access to external communities, you can set who can chat with you from those communities. See the following topics to learn more about setting your privacy preferences.
